reviewText: As the title says, this film relates the second volume of the adventures of the beloved knight errant, with the better- known episodes (windmills, sheep, shaving basin/helm) alluded to in the opening montage. In terms of setting, characterization, and overall production values this is by far the best treatment of Don Quixote that I have seen, and I've seen many.
I love all of Cantinflas' movies but this one is boring.
This movie was very entertaining for Cantinflas fans. Cantinflas made a rather good "Sancho Panza" in in the old Cervantes story.
If you like Cantinflas you will like this movie. I enjoyed it very much
